subject: Sono Toki.... Takeda Shingen
msgSnippet: For anyone in Japan, the next episode of Sono Toki, Rekishi ga Ugoita is on Takeda Shingen.  It airs on 9/1 at 9:15PM.  I think it is on NHK.

For anyone in Japan, the next episode of "Sono Toki, Rekishi ga 
Ugoita" is on Takeda Shingen.  It airs on 9/1 at 9:15PM.  I think it 
is on NHK.
